app.tagline: Project-ready gear lists with offline protection.
app.intro: Build equipment lists that match your production PDFs. Create projects, reuse templates, and export print-ready gear lists without leaving offline mode. Every edit is saved locally with redundant backups.

status.autosaveComplete: Autosave complete. Your project dashboard is safe.
status.savedExplicit: Saved safely to device storage and backups.
status.noData: No saved data yet. Start a project and autosave will protect it.
status.needProjectName: Please name the project before creating it.
status.projectCreated: New project created and protected by autosave.
status.needProjectBeforeCategory: Create a project before adding categories.
status.needCategoryName: Please name the category before adding it.
status.needItemName: Please provide an item name before adding.
status.itemAdded: Item added. Autosave will secure it immediately.
status.suggestionApplied: Suggestion applied and ready for autosave.
status.needProjectBeforeTemplate: Create a project before saving a template.
status.templateSaved: Template saved from the current project.
status.selectProjectForTemplate: Select a project before applying a template.
status.templateApplied: Template applied. Autosave will secure the updated list.
status.popupBlocked: Popup blocked. Please allow popups for PDF export.
status.pdfReady: PDF export ready. Confirm printing to save the file.
status.backupDownloaded: Backup downloaded. Store it somewhere safe.
status.importComplete: Import complete. Existing data was preserved.
status.clipboardCopied: Copied your gear list to the clipboard for sharing.
status.clipboardBlocked: Clipboard access was blocked. Use the download backup option instead.
status.clipboardUnavailable: Clipboard sharing is not available. Use the download backup option instead.
status.autosaveErrorMemory: Autosave encountered a storage error. Your data is still safe in memory.
status.storagePartial: Some storage locations could not be updated. Your latest data is still preserved in other backups.
status.indexedDbUnavailable: IndexedDB was unavailable. Checking device backups instead.
status.importFailed: Import failed. Please choose a valid backup file.
status.noDeviceBackup: No device backup was found yet.
status.historyInvalid: History must be an object when provided.
status.versionInvalid: Version must be numeric when provided.

projects.dashboardDescription: Track multiple productions and always know which list is active. New projects are autosaved the moment they are created.
projects.empty: No projects yet. Create your first project to begin building a gear list.

workspace.title: Active project workspace
workspace.noSelection: Select a project to start editing.
workspace.empty: Select or create a project to unlock the gear list editor.
workspace.noCategories: No categories yet. Add one above or apply a template.
workspace.itemsEmpty: No items yet. Add the first item above.
workspace.projectNotesDescription: Notes appear in exports and are included in backups for every project.
workspace.projectNotesPlaceholder: Crew notes, pickup info, or return instructions

templates.title: Template management
templates.description: Save reusable setups for recurring shoots. Templates can be applied to any project without overwriting existing data.
templates.empty: No templates yet. Save the active project to build your library.

sidebar.saveShareDescription: Your data stays on-device. Save immediately, create offline backups, and restore if you ever switch devices.
sidebar.statusPlaceholder: Status updates appear here to confirm data safety.

overview.title: Plan your production with confidence
overview.description: Use the dashboard, workspace, and templates together to keep every project organized.
bullets: Create one project per shoot to keep gear lists separated and secure.
Use categories to mirror departments, then add items with quantities and status tracking.
Templates let you reuse proven setups without overwriting live project data.
Typeahead suggestions remember past items, units, and details for faster entry.

offline.title: Work fully offline
offline.description: Every workflow is designed for offline use, from autosave to PDF export.
bullets: Autosave runs after each change and writes to multiple on-device locations.
Export PDF uses your browser print dialog without any network calls.
Use backup downloads to move data between devices without external services.
Restore from device backup to recover data even when you are offline.

backups.title: Protect every update
backups.description: Backup, import, and restore tools protect your data in case of device changes.
bullets: Click Save now before travel or power changes to force a full sync.
Download backups regularly to keep offline copies in secure storage.
Import backups to merge data with what you already have locally.
Restore from device backup if you need to recover the last autosave.

sharing.title: Share and export safely
sharing.description: Share gear lists with your team while keeping the source data local.
bullets: Share via clipboard to paste a backup into chats or notes apps.
Download backups before sharing to preserve an offline copy.
PDF export creates a print-ready layout for rental houses.
Project notes are included in exports for pickup and return instructions.
